alert.note: Alert for Hancock (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 9:28AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Hancock, southern Henry, southwestern Des Moines, northeastern Van Buren, Lee and southeastern Jefferson Counties through 1000 AM CDT... At 927 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hillsboro, or 11 miles northeast of Keosauqua, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Donnellson, St. Paul and Pilot Grove around 945 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include West Point, Franklin, New Boston, Fort Madison, Nauvoo and Montrose. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
